pages.index: Welcome to Front Foot - Your Ultimate Fantasy Cricket Experience About FAQ Download We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and provide personalized content. By continuing to use our site, you consent to the use of cookies. Thank you for visiting! Accept Decline GET APP LINK I accept Privacy Policy Step Up to the Crease and Rule the FRONT FOOT! Fantasy Cricket offers an electrifying strategic experience where you can assemble your own team and have the opportunity to win real rewards if your team emerges victorious. By selecting players from both teams to form an ideal lineup of 11 players, you will accumulate points based on their actual performance. Your prizes and earnings are determined by the total points you achieve. "FRONT FOOT" stands out as a prominent platform for fantasy cricket competitions. Our user-friendly gaming concepts have been meticulously crafted to enhance your winning prospects in fantasy sports contests. With a range of free and paid cricket leagues and competitions available, you can easily join and compete for cash rewards. Our cricket fantasy league boasts a large player base, with numerous participants having already claimed significant prizes. "FRONT FOOT" Fantasy Cricket App Screenshots What Is Fantasy Cricket? Fantasy Cricket is a virtual game where participants create their own team of real cricket players and earn points based on their on-field performances in actual matches. By strategically selecting players and forming a competitive lineup, participants can compete against each other in fantasy leagues or contests. The success of their chosen players in real matches determines their performance and potential rewards in the game. How To Play Fantasy Cricket? To play Fantasy Cricket, participants must first register on a fantasy cricket platform. They then select an upcoming match and create their fantasy team by choosing a specific number of players within a given budget. Participants can earn points based on the performance of their selected players in the actual match, with the highest-scoring team winning the fantasy league or contest and potentially earning prizes. What Is Fantasy Cricket? "FRONT FOOT" is considered one of the best platforms for Daily Fantasy Cricket due to its user-friendly interface, wide range of contests, attractive prize pools, and timely updates on player performance. The platform also offers detailed player statistics, expert analysis, and tips to help participants make informed decisions when creating their fantasy teams. Overall, "FRONT FOOT" provides a comprehensive and enjoyable fantasy cricket experience for users. Steps To Download Fantasy Cricket App For Android Users Enable Unknown Sources Download the "FrontFoot.apk" Install the "FrontFoot.apk" Frequently Asked Question How do I register on the Front Foot app? To register on Front Foot, download the app from the app store, click on the "Register" button, and follow the on-screen instructions to create an account. How do I create a fantasy team on Front Foot? After logging in, click on the upcoming match, select your fantasy team within the budget provided, and confirm your team selection before the deadline. How are points calculated on Front Foot? Points are awarded based on the performance of selected players in the actual match. Runs, wickets, catches, and other actions earn points for your fantasy team. Can I join contests on Front Foot? Yes, you can join various contests on Front Foot with entry fees and prize pools. Choose a contest that suits your preference. How can I track my fantasy team's performance on Front Foot? You can monitor your fantasy team's performance in real-time during the match. Points are updated as actions happen in the live game. How can I improve my fantasy cricket skills on Front Foot? Front Foot provides expert tips, player analysis, and strategy guides to help you make informed decisions and improve your fantasy cricket skills. What customer support services does Front Foot offer? For any queries or assistance, you can contact Front Foot's customer support team through the in-app chat, email support, or FAQs section. Are there any special promotions or bonuses for users on Front Foot? Front Foot frequently offers promotional contests, bonuses, and special discounts for users. Keep an eye on the app for updates on such offers. Is Front Foot available on both Android and iOS platforms? Yes, Front Foot is available for download on both Android and iOS platforms, providing seamless access to fantasy cricket games for users across different devices. Copyright @2024 const faq = document.querySelectorAll(".faqBlock__listItemTitle"); const accordionToggle = (e) => { e.currentTarget.classList.toggle("faqBlock__listItemActive"); const item = e.currentTarget.nextElementSibling; if (e.currentTarget.classList.contains("faqBlock__listItemActive")) { item.style.maxHeight = item.scrollHeight + "px"; } else { item.style.maxHeight = 0; } }; if (faq) { faq.forEach((el) => { el.addEventListener("click", accordionToggle); }); } document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () { const cookieNotification = document.getElementById("cookieInfoSection"); const cookiesChoice = localStorage.getItem("cookiesChoice"); if (cookiesChoice === "accepted") { cookieNotification.style.display = "none"; } else if (cookiesChoice === "declined") { cookieNotification.style.display = "none"; } else { cookieNotification.style.display = "block"; } }); function acceptCookies() { const cookieNotification = document.getElementById("cookieInfoSection"); localStorage.setItem("cookiesChoice", "accepted"); cookieNotification.style.display = "none"; } function declineCookies() { const cookieNotification = document.getElementById("cookieInfoSection"); localStorage.setItem("cookiesChoice", "declined"); cookieNotification.style.display = "none"; }
pages.policy: Privacy Policy for Front Foot Fantasy Cricket App About FAQ Download Privacy Policy Effective Date: 20 may 2023 At "Front Foot", we value your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website "Front Foot", and any other media form, media channel, mobile website, or mobile application related or connected thereto (collectively, the “Site”). Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site. 1. Information We Collect We may collect information about you in a variety of ways, including: rsonal Data: Personally identifiable information, such as your name, shipping address, email address, phone number, and demographic information, that you voluntarily give to us when you register with the site or when you choose to participate in various activities related to the site, such as online chat and message boards. rivative Data: Information our servers automatically collect when you access the site, such as your IP address, your browser type, your operating system, your access times, and the pages you have viewed directly before and after accessing the site. nancial Data: Financial information, such as data related to your payment method (e.g., valid credit card number, card brand, expiration date) that we may collect when you purchase, order, return, exchange, or request information about our services from the site. ta from Social Networks: User information from social networking sites, such as Facebook, Google+, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, including your name, your social network username, location, gender, birthdate, email address, profile picture, and public data for contacts, if you connect your account to such social networks. 2. Use of Your Information Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you via the site to: Create and manage your account. Process your transactions and send you a confirmation for your purchases. Send you a newsletter or marketing communication. Respond to customer service requests and support needs. Improve our site and user experience. Monitor and analyze usage and trends to improve your experience with the site. Notify you of updates to the site. Fulfill and manage purchases, orders, payments, and other transactions related to the site. Prevent fraudulent transactions, monitor against theft, and protect against criminal activity. 3. Disclosure of Your Information We may share information we have collected about you in certain situations. Your information may be disclosed as follows: By Law or to Protect Rights: If we believe the release of information about you is necessary to respond to legal process, to investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies, or to protect the rights, property, and safety of others, we may share your information as permitted or required by any applicable law, rule, or regulation. Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your information with third parties that perform services for us or on our behalf, including payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing assistance. Affiliates: We may share your information with our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy. Affiliates include our parent company and any subsidiaries, joint venture partners, or other companies that we control or that are under common control with us. Business Transfers: We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company. 4. Tracking Technologies We may use cookies, web beacons, tracking pixels, and other tracking technologies on the site to help customize the site and improve your experience. When you access the site, your personal information is not collected through the use of tracking technology. okies: Cookies are small text files placed on your hard drive by a web server. You can choose to have your computer warn you each time a cookie is being sent or turn off all cookies. You can do this through your browser settings. b Beacons: Web beacons are small graphic files that allow us or third parties to monitor your use of the site and collect usage data. 5. Security of Your Information We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and we cannot guarantee its absolute security. 6. Third-Party Websites The site may contain links to third-party websites and applications of interest, including advertisements and external services that are not affiliated with us. Once you leave the site, we cannot control the activities of these third parties. 7. Policy for Children We do not knowingly solicit information from or market to children under the age of 13. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under age 13 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information as quickly as possible. 8. Options Regarding Your Information You may at any time review or change the information in your account or terminate your account by: - Logging into your account settings and updating your account. - Contacting us using the contact information below. 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. 10. Contact Us If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: FrontFoot@gmail.com +919875352555 Thank you for using "Front Foot". Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting it.
